text: Another of the couple tracks in this OST that instantly remind me of the DS Zelda games, mainly Spirit Tracks, so it's probably composed by Minegishi. I'm glad we got 3D Land and 3D World, they felt like nice bridges between the Galaxy series and the upcoming Odyssey which I'm sure will be amazing. I can't shake the feeling that Odyssey will get pushed back to 2018 though. Hopefully I'm very wrong!
author: SupraDarky

text: That's very unlikely, considering they mentioned it's almost done with development. What makes you fear that?
author: Hawlo

text: I miss Zelda games with sound tracks, Breath of the Wild doesn't have enough music.
author: Ryan Peters

text: It's only been like, two Zelda games since we had /one/ game without music. It's not like for the past ten years we've had soundtrack-less Zelda games.
author: Song Of Ourselves

text: SupraDarky the first time I heard this track in game, I immediately knew it would be one of my favorites. It's got a smooth and very chill vibe.
author: Ryan Eichler

text: Odyssey will be great, this music almost has its own Modern Mario feel to it. I love this one in particular because it reminded me of CatDog, CatDog!
